Appointment - Class in model
Represents an appointment in the application.
Appointment(int, String, String, String, String, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime, int, int, int) - Constructor for class model.Appointment
Constructs a fully specified appointment with all details.
Appointment(int, String, String, String, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime, int) - Constructor for class model.Appointment
Constructs an appointment with reduced details, typically used when only key aspects of the appointment are required.
Appointment(int, LocalDateTime) - Constructor for class model.Appointment
Constructs an appointment focusing solely on its timing, typically used in scenarios where only the timing is relevant.
Appointment(String, int) - Constructor for class model.Appointment
Constructs an appointment focusing solely on its total per type.

areFieldsValid() - Method in class controller.ModifyAppointment
